item.description:
This is an all day free festival along Columbus Ave. in the South End. There are three stages and a schedule of concerts that include all types of jazz, blues, swing, soul, funk, r&b.... you name it! Booths are set up with great ethnic food, crafts, jewelry, etc and there is always a big crowd enjoyng the festive atmosphere. Check out www.beantownjazz.org/schedule.html for more details.
We will meet inside at Wally's Cafe, 427 Massachusetts Ave. at 11:00A.M. and I will have my black straw sun hat. First concert starts at 12:00 noon and the last one is at 5:00P.M., but you can stay as long as you want.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Bean Town Jazz Festival
